Comment: Abilities: A0OO (Burning Vengeance), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: If Ignacious would die, he instead regains some health for 30 seconds. If he attacks 5 times in this form, he revives instantly. Otherwise, he dies. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Restores 1200 health and increases attack damage by 40.|n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Restores 1500 health and increases attack damage by 60. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Restores 1800 health and increases attack damage by 80.
